game.l_dis:
G-Switch 4 â€“ The Ultimate Gravity-Defying Runner

G-Switch 4: Creator is the most advanced entry in the legendary runner series. Featuring a Story Mode, local multiplayer for up to 8 players, and a level editor, it combines speed, precision, and creativity into one adrenaline-filled experience.

What is G-Switch 4?

G-Switch 4 is a futuristic gravity-runner game where you tap to flip gravity and survive obstacle-packed levels. It builds on the previous versions with a comprehensive level creator, letting players design, share, and play custom challenges from around the world.

How to Play G-Switch 4?

  • Tap/Click: Flip gravity to switch between floor, ceiling, and walls.
  • Story Mode: Play through structured missions with unique challenges.
  • Multiplayer Mode: Up to 8 players can compete locally on a single device.
  • Level Creator: Design and share your own G-Switch stages.
  • Precision Timing: Dodge traps, lasers, and falling hazards at lightning speed.

Why Play G-Switch 4 Unblocked?

Key Features

  • Gravity-Flipping Action: Single-tap control with endless possibilities.
  • Story Mode: Campaign missions with increasing difficulty.
  • 8-Player Multiplayer: Compete with friends on the same device.
  • Level Editor: Create, share, and play thousands of community levels.
  • Unblocked Access: Play instantly from any browser.
